snippet: After the director was heckled at an awards ceremony, the New York Film Critics Circle issues an apology to Fox Searchlight and Mr. McQueen. But the critic who reportedly did the heckling, Armond White, says he never yelled anything.
abstract: After the director was heckled at an awards ceremony, the New York Film Critics Circle issues an apology to Fox Searchlight and Mr. McQueen. But the critic who reportedly did the heckling, Armond White, says he never yelled anything.

headline.main: New York Critics' Group Apologizes for Heckling, but Armond White Says He Didn't Yell Anything
